TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件呈现其一个模板，该模板由用户是否登录到主机网站以及包含登录用户帐户的角色确定。The control renders one of its templates, determined by whether a user is logged on to the host Web site, and the roles that contain the logged-on user account. 在可视化设计器中，当您从源切换到设计视图时，将分析描述控件的标记源代码， 并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 切换回源视图时，会将设计时控件持久保存到标记源代码，并将其编辑到网页的标记中。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类为控件提供设计时支持 。The class provides design-time support for the control. 属性返回一个 对象，该对象通常包含一个对象，该对象是从 设计器的继承树中的每个级别派生的。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. 属性为关联的控件的模板返回模板组的集合 。The property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated control. 属性始终返回 `true` ，指示设计器创建关联控件的临时副本 以生成设计时标记。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 类方法提供了以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法返回用于 在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。The methods return the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time. 如果未定义当前模板，则方法将获取在设计时呈现关联控件的占位符的标记。The method gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when the current template is not defined. 方法提供在发生错误时在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。The method provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred. - 方法返回关联控件的当前模板的序列化副本 。The method returns a serialized copy of the current template for the associated control. 方法从控件模板的序列化副本设置关联控件的一个区域。The method sets a region of the associated control from a serialized copy of a control template. - 方法准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的 控件。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 当关联的控件发生更改时，将调用方法。The method is called when there is a change to the associated control. 方法用于从关联控件的中移除属性、向其添加其他属性或隐藏属性。The method is used to remove properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 类，以便在设计时更改从控件派生的控件的外观和行为 。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance and behavior of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例从派生 `MyLoginView` 控件 。The example derives the `MyLoginView` control from the . `MyLoginView`是控件的副本 。The `MyLoginView` is a copy of the control. 该示例还 `MyLoginViewDesigner` 从类派生类 ，并 `MyLoginViewDesigner` 在控件上应用的特性 `MyLoginView` 。The example also derives the `MyLoginViewDesigner` class from the class and applies a attribute for the `MyLoginViewDesigner` on the `MyLoginView` control. `MyLoginViewDesigner`控件重写以下 成员：The `MyLoginViewDesigner` control overrides the following members: - 用于使 属性在设计时在 "**属性**" 网格中可见的方法。The method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. - 用于在控件周围绘制橙色边框以使其范围更可见的方法。The method to draw an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. - 为包含错误消息的占位符生成标记的方法，该错误消息以红色粗体文本显示。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. - 为包含为控件定义的角色组的名称的占位符生成标记的方法。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that contains the names of the role groups that are defined for the control. - 如果关联的控件不是对象，则为引发异常的方法 `MyLoginView` 。The method to throw an exception, if the associated control is not a `MyLoginView` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在 设计图面上创建关联控件或该控件的副本时，.NET Framework 在内部构造该类的新实例。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

The associated with this designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性 为类创建一个对象 ，将其添加到 从基属性获取的， 然后返回 。The property creates a object for the class, adds it to the that is obtained from the base property, and then returns the .

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联的 控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个字符串，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A string containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将关联控件的模板索引设置 为当前设计时索引，并在必要时使关联控件重新创建和数据绑定其子控件。The method sets the template index of the associated control to the current design-time index, and then causes the associated control to recreate and data bind its child controls, if necessary. 接下来， 调用 基方法来生成标记。Next, the calls the base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在从类继承的类中重写方法 ，以便在设计时更改从类派生的控件的外观 。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例在控件周围绘制橙色边框，使其范围更可见。The example draws an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果重写 方法，请务必调用 基方法，因为它最终会通过多个重写级别、对控件的调用 或控件的副本来生成标记。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String

param.name: regions
param.span: 一个 ，其中将添加 的设计时视图中的可选择和可单击区域。

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记，并填充设计器区域的集合。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.

returns.span: 一个字符串，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A string containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 为可视化设计器图面上的模板编辑区域创建一个对象，然后将其初始化为模板。The method creates an object for a template editing area on the visual designer surface, and then initializes it as a template. 如果未定义任何模板，则会显示一个字符串，提示您单击开始编辑。If no templates are defined, a string is displayed that prompts you to click to begin editing. 预定义的常量用于生成返回的标记。A predefined constant is used to generate the returned markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在从类继承的类中重写方法 ，以便在设计时更改从类派生的控件的外观 。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例在控件周围绘制橙色边框，使其范围更可见。The example draws an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 此 重载不会对其基方法或控件调用 来生成标记。

span.span: This overload does not call on its base method or the control to generate the markup.

Public Overrides Function GetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion) As String

span.span: The for which to obtain content.

summary.span: 返回用于在设计时呈现关联控件的当前模板的序列化副本。

span.span: Returns a serialized copy of the current template that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个字符串，其中包含用于在设计时呈现关联 的模板的序列化副本。

span.span: A string containing a serialized copy of the template used to render the associated at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 可从参数中获取实现接口的模板 `region` ，则方法将 返回持久性模板。If a template implementing the interface can be obtained from the `region` parameter, the method returns the persisted template. 否则，它会调用 基方法来生成内容。Otherwise, it calls the base method to generate the content. 使用方法可将序列化模板还原到 控件 。The serialized template can be restored to the control by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 如果当前模板未定义，获取在设计时呈现关联控件的占位符的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when the current template is not defined.

returns.span: 一个字符串，包含在设计图面上呈现到占位符的标记文本。

span.span: A string containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先设置字符串消息的格式，该消息指定关联控件的当前模板的名称 ，并指定该模板为空。The method first formats a string message that specifies the name of the current template of the associated control and also specifies that the template is empty. 然后，将 生成包含该消息的占位符的标记。Then the generates the markup for a placeholder containing that message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在从类继承的类中重写方法 ，以便在设计时更改从类派生的控件的外观 。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例将为包含 为关联控件定义的所有对象的名称的占位符生成标记。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the names of all the objects that are defined for the associated control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(class System.Exception e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (e As Exception) As String

span.span: The that was thrown.

summary.span: 如果发生了错误，提供在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred.

returns.span: 一个字符串，包含发生错误后在设计时呈现关联 的标记。

span.span: A string that contains the markup used to render the associated at design time after an error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 错误设计时 控件呈现为一个面板，其中包含类型名称、控件名称以及公告和描述错误的消息。The error design-time control renders as a panel that contains the type name, the control name, and messages announcing and describing the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在从类继承的类中重写方法 ，以便在设计时更改从类派生的控件的外观 。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例生成包含错误消息的占位符的标记，该错误消息以红色粗体文本显示。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#2)]

Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , which implements an .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当可视化设计器 准备好使用设计器呈现控件时，将调用方法 。The visual designer calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 及其基方法会配置属性并设置设计器操作所需的事件。The and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数是 与此设计器或控件的副本关联的控件 。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在从类继承的类中重写方法 ，以便在设计时更改从类派生的控件的行为 。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the behavior of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 如果关联的控件不是对象，则该示例引发 `MyLoginView` 。The example throws an , if the associated control is not a `MyLoginView` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#6)]

exception.span: 不是 ，也不属于 的派生类。

span.span: is not a or of a class derived from .

span.span: The source of the event.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 与此设计器关联的控件发生更改时调用。

span.span: Called when there is a change to the control that is associated with this designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 关联控件的事件执行时，将调用方法 。The method is called when the event of the associated control executes. 通常，这是为了响应控件上的属性更改 (例如， **属性** 网格更改) 。Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). 如果 更改了控件模板，则会刷新 " **属性** " 网格。If the control template is changed, the **Properties** grid is refreshed. 验证当前模板索引是否有效，然后调用 基方法。The verifies that the current template index is valid, and then calls the base method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added or shadowed properties.

summary.span: 由设计器用来从 " **属性** " 网格的显示中移除属性或向其添加属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用从方法派生的方法， 用设计器实现的相应设计时属性隐藏各种控件属性，以及在 " **属性** " 网格中添加或删除属性。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 方法应用属性的属性， 使其不显示在 "**属性**" 网格中。The method applies the attribute of the property so that it does not appear in the **Properties** grid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在从类继承的类中重写方法 ，以便在设计时更改从类派生的控件的 **属性** 网格 。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the **Properties** grid of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例使 属性在 **属性** 网格中可见。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#3)]

para.span: 重写 方法，以便在设计时属性集合中将属性添加到、删除属性，或更改属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to, remove properties from, or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保 在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion, content As String)
public: override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(System::Web::UI::Design::EditableDesignerRegion ^ region, System::String ^ content);

param.name: region
param.span: 一个 ，提供要更新的区域的名称。

span.span: An that provides the name of the region to update.

param.name: content
param.span: 一个字符串，其中包含关联控件的序列化模板。

span.span: A string that contains a serialized template for the associated control.

summary.span: 根据控件模板的序列化副本设置关联控件的一个区域。

span.span: Sets a region of the associated control from a serialized copy of a control template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法分析参数所指定的关联控件的序列化模板 `content` ，然后使用该模板更新由参数的属性指定的控件的区域 `region` 。The method parses a serialized template for the associated control that is specified by the `content` parameter, and then uses the template to update the region of the control that is specified by the property of the `region` parameter. 控件的当前模板 可以使用方法进行序列化 。The current template of the control can be serialized using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取用于关联控件字段的模板组集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.

value.span: 一个 ， 控件中每个模板都有一个元素包含在其中。

span.span: A containing an element for each template in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性 从 基属性获取对象，然后添加 对象，这些对象包含匿名模板的单个 对象 (该对象对应于未登录的用户) 、登录模板以及 关联控件的集合中的每个元素 。The property gets a object from the base property, and then adds objects that contain a single object for the anonymous template (which corresponds to no user logged on), for the logged-on template, and for each element in the collection of the associated control to the . 将 此返回 到调用方。The returns this to the caller.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示设计器是否应使用临时副本取代与设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 属性始终为 `true` ，因此设计器 属性返回关联控件的副本， 以生成设计时标记。Because the property is always `true`, the designer property returns a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 属性通过保持实际的 控件，然后分析持久化的控制字符串来创建副本。The property creates the copy by persisting the actual control, then parsing the persisted control string. 复制的控件不会影响实际的任何持久性 。The copied control does not affect any persistence for the actual . 如果 已重写属性以返回 `false` ，则设计器将使用关联 控件本身来生成设计时标记，对控件的设计时更改将保留在页标记源中。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated control itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.

para.span: 您可以重写 属性以返回 或根据控件是否标记为类级别特性来确定其值 。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level attribute.

para.span: 如果 未重写，则将 忽略 。

span.span: If the is not overridden, the ignores the .
